ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok hows this: I was a Senior Guide for 11 months I dealt with, in that time, roughly 500 people who lost anywhere from 1 item to an entire corpse to various
ygData.messageBody:
Ok hows this:

I was a Senior Guide for 11 months
I dealt with, in that time, roughly 500 people who lost anywhere from 1 item
to an entire corpse to various corpse loss/item loss bugs.

That's 1 server
out of what? 26?


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2000 12:51 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
>
>
> >they may be incredibly rare, but what if it happened to you? i bet you
> wouldn't
> >have it so far down on the priority list then. what is the higher
> priority, something
> >people have already learned to work around or something which
> can wipe out
> >hundreds of hours of playtime on a character?
> >you know well over 100 players, eh? out of the 200000
> subscribers. yeah,
> that's
> >an appropriate sample size to determine that poofed corpses are
> just not a
> problem.
>
> If it happened to me? Either they'd fix it or I'd be done with
> EQ. That's
> what customer service is about. No it still wouldn't be a higher
> priority.
>
> I was only counting the people I know in RL personally. I doubt anyone
> knows an appropriate sample size in that way. From seeing the boards
> though, there are hundreds of posts on bard song bugs, very few on having
> one's own corpse poof.
>
> Kit
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
